name: PG Tipple
description: Another refreshing but sophisticated cocktail from The Spotted Pig. The tea acts as a bitter accent at the end of each sip.
recipeIngredient: 1 quart water, just under a boil
3 ounces PG Tips tea (as brewed above)

recipeInstructions.text: In a resealable container or pitcher, add hot water, tea bag, and mint sprig. Let steep overnight.
For the cocktail: Combine 3 ounces brewed tea, lemon juice, simple syrup, orange marmalade, and bourbon in a cocktail shaker. Shake without ice.
Fill a Collins glass with ice, pour cocktail (unstrained) into glass. Top with lemon wedge if desired.
